snippet: The Royal Bank of Scotland said Tuesday that Nathan Bostock resigned as chief financial officer to join Banco Santander’s British unit as deputy chief executive and chief risk officer.
abstract: The Royal Bank of Scotland said Tuesday that Nathan Bostock resigned as chief financial officer to join Banco Santander’s British unit as deputy chief executive and chief risk officer.

headline.main: Finance Chief of R.B.S. Resigns After 3 Months in Post
